website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and small, these are good as general party or bowling party favors.
pros: Each set consists of 10 mini bowling pins and a marble-sized ball
Each order will net you 6 sets
cons: Some of these arrive with broken marbles, or the marbles break easily soon after

customer_reviews.title: Product not as image shows
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as advertised. It's a mini bowling set, yes, but there is no mini bowling ball as shown in the picture. It is a plain large green colored marble. I wish the company would display a photo of the honest product instead of a random stock photo. This is for a bowling party and it says marble in the description but after looking at the photo displayed I figured it was a marble painted to look like a bowling ball. This was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Withers

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: The kids really enjoyed playing with these. There's just something about tiny things. FYI - The bowling ball is just a marble. I used the pins as cupcake toppers and candy for the bowling ball for my son's 2nd birthday at the bowling alley. We also gave each child a set in their goody bag to take home. They all loved them! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: ACarrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on a cake I will be decorating. The pins are super cute and made of a nice solid plastic material so they have some weight to them. The bowling ball marble is just as pictured, maybe not quite size proportionate to the pins but it works. The sets that won’t be going on the adult cake will be given to the children who will be there. I know they’ll get a kick out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Cute mini bowling sets
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to use these in my literacy centers in kindergarten for a sight word bowling game. I'm not sure the little sticker bands are going to last long though - so I may have to just peel them off and draw them on with a paint pen instead...
customer_reviews.author: ArmenianMama

customer_reviews.title: Comes with cat-eye marbles
customer_reviews.text: It literally came with cat-eye marbles INSTEAD of the little black bowling balls it has pictured. Not the look I was going for but still practical.
customer_reviews.author: Janine C.

customer_reviews.title: Only 12, not 24!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are ONLY 12 not 24 games included. Very disappointing since this was for a party favor for a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these miniature bowling game sets as party favors for my child's bowling birthday party. What a hit with the kids! Great quality too. The bowling ball is a large marble and the pins are ceramic (or something similar) so there aren't little plastic pins flying all over the place when the marble hits them. Seems durable. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a party favor to all the guests at my son's bowling party. Boys loved it and it was perfect gift for the party theme. I didn't actually use it myself, but for the propose of party favors it was ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Big Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth while
customer_reviews.text: These were not initially very popular at our elementary school carnival event, but we almost sold out of the product after all the slimes and spinners and squishies were gone. It's not a bad item at all. Really could be fun to play indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for favors or cupcake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our son's bowling party. I ordered several packs and used the bowling pins as cupcake toppers. The "bowling ball" is a large marble so I didn't use that for the toppers. I also ordered packs to give out as favors. The children loved it!
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: For all ages!
customer_reviews.text: The miniature bowling set was a great hit as a party favor,concluding a birthday party at the local bowling alley. Both boys and girls loved it. Even the older 11 year old siblings thought that they were so cute. A very nice party favor!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A party favor that doesn’t have quality control
customer_reviews.text: They worked for the most part. The cut on the pins where pretty bad. Two to three pins couldn’t even stand up in each set. Good thing kids don’t care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Lioness

customer_reviews.title: popular loot bag gift
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo had a bowling party and we gave these in the loot bag. They were popular and cute. kids like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Gottesman

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon Games
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my pet raccoon bcuz he loves to play with them! He opens them himself and rolls the ball & plays with the pins. He’s a trip. They arrived on time & good value for the money! Bert is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Game
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but very difficult to play with. The pins have uneven bottoms which prevent the pins from standing up. Some even have a bump on the bottom of the pin. It was so frustrating for my daughter because she wanted to play mini bowling. I had to try filing down the bottom of most of the pins.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT BAG STUFFER FOR BOWLING PARTY
customer_reviews.text: I USED THESE FOR GIFT BAG STUFFERS FOR OUR DAUGHTERS BOWLING PARTY. THEY WERE GREAT. BUT NOT FOR SMALL CHILDREN - CHOKING HAZARD. BUT PERFECT FOR OUR OLDER DAUGHTERS PARTY.
customer_reviews.author: Criket 797

customer_reviews.title: Bowling party loot bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit in 10 year olds bowling party lot bag. Also popular with younger nieces and nephews
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Gottesman

customer_reviews.title: Great little party gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and the kids loved them! Gave as party favors for a bowling birthday party. Paired these with the bowling pin water bottles. The kids took them home and challenged their parents that night! Lots of fun and decent price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Really cute toy
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect party bag toys for my son's bowling birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: V. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my students to practice subtraction
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my students to practice subtraction! However, be prepared with extra marbles- a couple of mine were shattered when delivered. I figured some would get lost, so I just bought more marbles rather than returning the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the quantity before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Read this review! I ordered "two" and six arrived. Read the quantity before placing your order.
customer_reviews.author: Heymanlol

customer_reviews.title: A hit
customer_reviews.text: I held a men’s outing at a bowling alley and gave these out to all the participants. They were a hit and softened the blow for those that did not win.
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: The bowling balls don't look like they do in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The bowling balls don't look like they do in the picture. They are just a marble with swirls in it and no finger holes. I painted them black with acrylic and then put white dots on for the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Description is incorrect. Says 24 pack but there are only 12 in the pack. Very disappointed. Ordered these for my son’s birthday favors for 20 kids but I couldn’t use them since I had only 12.
customer_reviews.author: Srilata Dabbiru

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I use these little sets for practicing subtraction in my classroom. It’s a pretty good deal and my kids like using them. I actually like that the balls are just marbles so if they got lost I know what to use. Really you could use anything but the pins are definitely small and fall easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Mini bowling game
customer_reviews.text: The kids had fun playing with these mini bowling games.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Fun favor for kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: These were used as party favors. They were a hit for kids of all ages 5-13 years old. The bowling ball does look like a marble just like another person said below.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again! Packaging could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: Great party favor gift. However, some packaging was falling apart and pieces could easily fall out.
customer_reviews.author: geekmommy

customer_reviews.title: only received half
customer_reviews.text: love the actual product. only received 12 of the 24. Had to run out last minute to buy a similar product to have enough goodie bags for my twins birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for party favors for my daughter’s birthday party at the bowling alley.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun to play!
customer_reviews.text: I’m playing with my 3 and 7 years old boys. It’s pretty fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Half of the packages came bent and damaged and two were even open with the pins flopping around in the bag. However, the ones that were still sealed shut weren’t un-giftable and still made decent party favors for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: zkxkzxqqwertyuiopazdfghjklQwertyuiopasdfghjklszxcvbnm

customer_reviews.title: Bowling party favors
customer_reviews.text: We used these for party favors for a bowling party. Small parts so best for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaB

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as expected. I had two sets with cracks and the company emailed me apologizing and seeking ways to make it right. Awesome customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all had flat bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Bottoms were uneven, some wouldn’t even stay standing. So frustrating to try to play with my 10 year old, takes you so long just to set up the wobbly uneven pins. Bought the same item at party city with better bottoms
customer_reviews.author: diana guzman

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Bowling
customer_reviews.text: We received our 12 pack just b4 the holiday! The idea was to give of my 8 family members one for Christmas representing my gift...a future gathering at CineBowl!! It was a hit, everyone tore into their bowling sets and we were all on the floor/tables bowling! Love the quality of the sets and the price was spot on! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Boodamama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child’s bowling party
customer_reviews.text: I used the pins as a cupcake topper for my son’s 11th birthday! They looked really good along with a chocolate malt ball as bowling ball. The ball that came inside the package is more like a marble then a bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Marti

customer_reviews.title: Fun favors kids will enjoy .
customer_reviews.text: The children enjoyed playing with these toys. Gave them away as party favors. I made a mistake of handing them out before party is over. The kids were already opening them and playing with them on the floor. Great for 7-10 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: No comments
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice! I just imagine this game in my head with this toy all over the floors being a parent’s nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Mahealani

customer_reviews.title: Great for cupcake toppers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a bowling-themed birthday. They are the perfect size for cupcake toppers! The stripes at the neck of the pins is just a sticker and a few had fallen off during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Made well and works well
customer_reviews.text: The bowling pins are weighted enough to stand well but are easy be to knock down with the marble.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: cute party favor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a party favor for my kid's bowling party. The kids loved them. The balls came in different colors too - a fun touch.
customer_reviews.author: MmeClavie

customer_reviews.title: Received on time!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! We used them in our minute to win it series of games and they were a hit (no pun intended) :-)
customer_reviews.author: grlgness

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Used as party favors for a bowling party the kids (and adults) loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Manadasy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for daughter's bowling birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for daughter's bowling birthday party. We used these as part of the party bag for guests. They all loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JPLG

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for a classroom teacher.
customer_reviews.text: The teacher uses them for subtraction and addition games with her students. Work great for that and the kids love doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Karter

customer_reviews.title: Pins are wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The pins are not flat at the bottom so they fall down easily while setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ling

customer_reviews.title: It is cute
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. I bought it to give to friends and one for me. I have it on a table and when we pass by we give a shot. I used the cover of the shoe box so the pieces or the ball won't fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are dirty!
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning these. They are filthy inside the packaging. The pins are brown and there is a brown layer on the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor for a bowling party!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids all thought these mini bowling sets were lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: WildWestAdventurer

customer_reviews.title: Very good party favor However it’s very tiny made for kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good party favor However it’s very tiny made for kids 7 and up
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute game
customer_reviews.text: Super cute game! We gave these away as a party favor at my child’s birthday party which was held at a bowling alley. Big hit with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Bowling Game Set for our daughter's 6th birthday bowling party. The order arrived in timely manner, and was received in the manner in which it was advertised. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favors!
customer_reviews.text: These were fun additions for my son's 10th birthday party favor bags. He didn't have a bowling party but they were still a great thing to add to his goody bags.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a math lesson in kindergarten and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect as a thank you gift for a kid's birthday party. They absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.author: J. I. Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with item
customer_reviews.text: Just like picture. I have not opened yet they are for a party later in week.
customer_reviews.author: juliann

customer_reviews.title: Kids had a ball with these!
customer_reviews.text: I put these in the goody bags for my son's bowling birthday party. They were a big hit with the kids and my own children have been playing with them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: JBJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun little game
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson loves bowling. He loves playing with this so much that I made him a little bowling alley.
customer_reviews.author: bw2012

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor
customer_reviews.text: The bowling set came exactly as shown in the picture. I bought this as favors for my son's 5th birthday party. The kids all seemed to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: They all enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.text: Gabe them as gifts at my kids birthday party. They all enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Favor
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the toy. We used them as a birthday favor for his bowling birthday party. The kids thought they were cool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute well packaged product fits all my expectations, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Idorn Medford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for bowling party favors. The kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: fabiana

customer_reviews.title: Ideal as party favors
customer_reviews.text: Product is great purchased for my grandsons b-day goody bags.
customer_reviews.author: hidden object guru

customer_reviews.title: There are 12 individually packaged sets in this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These little toys are a great value for the money. I used them as thank you gifts for students who helped me during our bowling unit. The kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Casey L. Bain

customer_reviews.title: Cute party favor
customer_reviews.text: Cute party favor for a kids bowling birthday party. Looks just like pictured.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kriesand

customer_reviews.title: Teaching tool
customer_reviews.text: I used the bowling set for my students to learn how to subtract. They had a blast with the bowling sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steffey

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: Great party favor! Product exactly as described, well packaged, sturdy and both the boys and girls had a great time playing with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Uses in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the product I used it for teaching math and in elementary school setting. The students board to learn about fractions and recorded their answers.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Item as described.. received 12 packs of miniature bowling set. Each set had its own 10 pins and a big marble ball. Was instant hit with kids of all ages - they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul B

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Kindergarten teacher, and use these for teaching the combinations of ten. The kids love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid's parties!
customer_reviews.text: We provided these bowling kits to party-goers in favor bags. It really did strike up the fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great party favir
customer_reviews.text: The kids at my twins bowling birthday party loved their mini bowling party favors.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for birthday favor
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these for my sons birthday party favor. They are a hit!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality an price. Very happy with our purchase. Would definitely order from this company again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, worked wonderful for my 6 year olds bowling birthday party. Thank you 😊

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice party favor for my sons bowling party!

customer_reviews.title: Mini Bowling Set
customer_reviews.text: Cute party favors. Large marble in the center of package works better to knock the pins over than a black plastic ball would.

customer_reviews.title: They were a perfect pin set for a little wooden bowling lane
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a junior high shop project. They were a perfect pin set for a little wooden bowling lane.

customer_reviews.title: Only problem I ordered one and received 2 so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I ordered one and received 2 so I am stuck with a pack of twelve I did not need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something that looked like the picture above (like an actual bowling ball)
customer_reviews.text: Ball shown in photo is not what you get. You get a marble. The other reviews have stated this. If you're ok with that, the rest of the set looks ok, but I'm returning because, being a bowler, I wanted something that looked like the picture above (like an actual bowling ball).
customer_reviews.author: B. Iaco

customer_reviews.title: ... bowling in my 1st grade classroom and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use them for subtraction bowling in my 1st grade classroom and my kids love it!!

customer_reviews.title: ... customers and they are loving them- such a cute fun little game
customer_reviews.text: I got these to send in LuLaRoe packages I mail out as a little gift for my customers and they are loving them- such a cute fun little game!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product comes exactly like it looks on the website. Thanks so much.

customer_reviews.title: What a WASTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. I bought it for a favor to give out fir my sons 4th bowling Birthday party. It looked so cute, but when they arrived, the packaging was very cheap & when my son started to play with it, the marble ball cracked in half. I found out from a few other people that we gave it to that it happened to them as well. Im really dissappointed & wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: I ordered bowling... Not marbles
customer_reviews.text: These bowling sets have a large marble.. Not a bowling ball. The description and picture for this product are incorrect. I needed small bowling balls and pins. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: this is very small, guess you get for what you pay for. cant really use it as a bowling set, also the ball is not the black ball that's being shown on the picture. The picture is misleading. It's only the size of your pinkie finger.
customer_reviews.author: Hongzhen C.

customer_reviews.title: It's more like a marble
customer_reviews.text: Not a bowling ball as pictured. It's more like a marble. Returned.

customer_reviews.title: Cute affordable game--great for party favors!
customer_reviews.text: cute little game that I included as party favors for my daughter's 5th birthday bowling party. :-)

product_meta.title: Kicko Miniature Bowling Game Set - 12 Pack Deluxe - for Kids, Playing, Party, Fun, Boys, Girls, Bowlers Etc.
feature_bullets: MINI BOWLING SET - Kicko’s miniature bowling set comes with 12 1 ½ Inch bowling pins with a marble bowling ball for the perfect mini bowling set.

GREAT FOR KIDS - Kids will absolutely love this mini bowling set. Small size makes it perfect for children to play with. Kids can bring them to school or anywhere in general and share the fun with their friends! All it takes is a little set up.
GREAT FOR PARTY - This miniature bowling game makes such a great party favor! Comes in blister card packaging so they can be put anywhere. Stuff into goodie bags, gift bags or prize bags for games.

USE AS PROP - This mini bowling game can also be used a prop. Miniature size is great to go with other miniature figures to make a cool funny video out of. Can even be used as a display piece wherever you want in your home or office!
GREAT FOR ANY AGE - Kicko miniature bowling game is great for people of all ages. Anybody can get some quick fun out of these no matter how old you are.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars186 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
